resources.string: View, Add, Delete and Update Entries
View, Add, Delete and Update Entries
Select an entry to modify or delete it. Scroll down to see new entries at the bottom of the ListView.
Step 2: Get Addresses and Save To Database
Results of converting lat/long into addresses using geocode intent
Enter an address to query DB for lat/long
Result of address query to get lat/long in database
Step 4: View, Add, Delete and Update Entries

Pressing this button will open a new activity where you can view the database records as a ListView. You can then select the row you wish to modify or delete. You can also add a new record if you wish.
